com.magnet.spi

Interface LogicalConnector<T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    PlatformProvider, ServiceConnector<T>, ServiceProvider

    @Contract
public interface LogicalConnector<T>
extends ServiceConnector<T>
    An extension of ServiceConnector that can handle logical to physical mappings.

    Logical connectors support the ability to be injected with a set of physical connectors to handle branching to them based on some implementation level strategy.

    A physical connector is a ServiceConnector implementation that does NOT implement LogicalConnector.

    Multiple physical connectors are permitted to be configured only when there is a logical connector present as well. There can be at most one logical connector present.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface com.magnet.spi.PlatformProvider

        MAGNET_VERSION_1_0_0, MAGNET_VERSION_2_0_0

    • Method Detail

      • setPhysicalConnectors

        void setPhysicalConnectors(List<ServiceConnector<T>> connectors)
        Establishes the set of physical connectors that this logical connector should manage, along with information describing each connector.

        This happens before PostConstruct is called.

        Note that the iteration order of the mapped is important here, and represents the order in which physical connectors should be called by the logical connector implementation.
